definition: Zijin county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong
a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
Purple Mountain in suburbs of Nanjing, with Ming tombs and Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum
flavored roasted seaweed/generic term for edible seaweed/Japanese: nori
thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color/fig. a profusion of flourishing trades

sentences.english: The route and experiments for synthesis of carbazole violet are described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了咔唑紫的合成路線及實驗過程。

sentences.english: Has the purple devoted to encourage and comfort can only temporarily soothe her injured heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾紫陌的鼓勵和安慰也只能暫時稍稍安撫她受傷的心。

sentences.english: For example, mysterious purple, ambiguous rose, spacious white.
sentences.chinese: 想過用神祕的紫，曖昧的玫，空靈的白。

sentences.english: Destination China is one of the finest Destination Management Companies in China.
sentences.chinese: 北京紫都國旅是中國首屈一指的接待公司。

sentences.english: Firstly, craftsmen choose pieces of copper of exactly the same thickness.
sentences.chinese: 工匠們要先選取厚薄均勻的紫銅片。

sentences.english: Listen, I got to level 25 and reached purple lotus swamp, right?
sentences.chinese: 聽着，我現在25級了，然後到了紫蓮花沼澤對吧？

sentences.english: Add this to the cabbage, carrots and apples evenly.
sentences.chinese: 然後在這裏面加入等量的紫甘藍，胡蘿蔔和蘋果。

sentences.english: She would like it signed on a Russian sable coat.
sentences.chinese: 她想讓他把名字簽在一件俄羅斯的紫貂皮大衣上。

sentences.english: Last Thursday the nurse hurt her finger and it turned black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 上週四這護士傷了他的手指，手指變得又青有紫。

sentences.english: Bill was beaten black and blue by a bad boy with a traveling bag on his back.
sentences.chinese: 比爾被一個揹着旅行包的壞男孩打得青一塊紫一塊。

sentences.english: Up to your preference, if you want to make the background a little more purple.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想把背景弄得更紫一點，可根據需要而定。

sentences.english: Her last chance at winning any necklace is Amethyst.
sentences.chinese: 她唯一有機會能贏下的是紫水晶項鍊。

sentences.english: After paying the bill, he braved the snow storm and started trekking north, carrying Violet in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 結算了店帳，抱着阿紫，衝風冒雪的向北行走。

sentences.english: The spring snow melt, all things recovery, 10000 Purple Yan-hong, to give hope.
sentences.chinese: 春天冰雪融化，萬物復甦，萬紫嫣紅，給人們希望。

sentences.english: With nothing livid, still her lips were red.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一絲青與紫，她依然擁有紅潤嘴脣。

sentences.english: She shouldn't wear her rather seductive purple dress for the journey.
sentences.chinese: 她不應該穿這件相當誘惑人的紫衣服去。

definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
